translated: The passage from “Sons of gods, any son of a good family or daughter of a good family” up to “those who practice for eons or the remainder of an eon in other sūtras that are devoid of the perfection of wisdom” teaches that

original: bskal pa'am bskal pa bas kyang lhag par spyod pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bas /
analyzed: bskal pa'am bskal pa bas kyang lhag par spyod pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bas /
translated: sons of a good family or daughters of a good family of the vehicles of the hearers and solitary realizers who practice for eons or even longer than an eon in the sūtras of the vehicle of the hearers and solitary realizers that are devoid of the meaning of the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa phan yon che ba bstan pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa phan yon che ba bstan pa ste /
translated: are not as beneficial as those who practice this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: myur du 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba las thar te bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: myur du 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba las thar te bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: “Swiftly” means that they will be liberated from cyclic existence and quickly attain unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phul du bya ba'i chos gang la zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phul du bya ba'i chos gang la zhes bya ba nas /
translated: It is because this perfection of wisdom has been taught extensively, up to “the qualities that are foremost,

original: gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bslabs te /
analyzed: gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bslabs te /
translated: where the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfect and Complete Buddha trained,🔽and where he fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, and where he will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher bstan to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad pa phan yon che ba'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher bstan to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad pa phan yon che ba'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
translated: This passage teaches the reason why practicing this profound perfection of wisdom has great benefits.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i chos bzang po phul du byung ba thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i chos bzang po phul du byung ba thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan te /
translated: All the excellent and sublime teachings to be learned by the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas are extensively taught in this perfection of wisdom.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos de la bslab pa dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang chos de la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos de la bslab pa dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang chos de la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
translated: The śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas, having trained in those teachings, and the tathāgatas of the three times, having trained in those teachings, have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: Therefore, if one practices this profound perfection of wisdom, one will quickly emerge in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: @122a * // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: @122a * // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Then the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm exclaimed,

original: de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byung bar gyur te 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byung bar gyur te 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: having trained in it, the bodhisattva great beings have appeared and will appear in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: lha'i bu de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa phan yon che bar rtogs nas mos te /
analyzed: lha'i bu de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa phan yon che bar rtogs nas mos te /
translated: With this, the gods, having realized that the benefits of practicing this perfection of wisdom are great, were inspired.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstod pa bstan pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstod pa bstan pa ste /
translated: They taught praise of the perfection of wisdom.

original: ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod pa'i tshig rnams sus kyang ma bskul bar rang byung ba la ched du brjod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yin pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod pa'i tshig rnams sus kyang ma bskul bar rang byung ba la ched du brjod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The so-called expressions of joy are the words of praise, This perfection of wisdom is a great perfection, an immeasurable perfection, an incomparable perfection, and so on, which occur spontaneously without being prompted by anyone.

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de la bslabs shing dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de la bslabs shing dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te /
translated: The Blessed One, having trained in the profound perfection of wisdom, those who follow by faith have appeared.

original: 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dus gsum gyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so'i 'bras bu thob pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs te /
analyzed: 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dus gsum gyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so'i 'bras bu thob pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs te /
translated: The words have appeared, will appear, and so on, refer to the attainment of the individual fruits by the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas of the three times, who have trained in this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: so so'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo yin no zhes bstod pa'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'bri ba'am 'phel ba yang mi dga'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di theg pa gsum char 'bras bu thob pa'i rgyu yin yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi
analyzed: so so'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo yin no zhes bstod pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'bri ba'am 'phel ba yang mi dga'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di theg pa gsum char 'bras bu thob pa'i rgyu yin yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the great perfection because it causes the attainment of the individual fruits.🔽This perfection of wisdom is not pleased with decrease or increase.

original: rtog cing mi 'gyur ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin pas 'di la 'gyur ba med do zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rtog cing mi 'gyur ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin pas 'di la 'gyur ba med do zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus, although this profound perfection of wisdom is the cause for attaining the fruits of all three vehicles, it is not changed by that, because it is naturally non-conceptual and unchanging, and is completely perfected.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis zhes bya ba nas gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni gzugs yod pa'i khams su 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni lha'i bu de dag gis shes rab
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis zhes bya ba nas gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni gzugs yod pa'i khams su 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni lha'i bu de dag gis shes rab
translated: The sons of gods who live in the desire realm and the sons of gods who live in the form realm, from “those sons of gods” up to “the sons of gods who live in the form realm are established in the form realm,” show that those sons of gods,

original: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab mo rtogs nas mgu ste /
analyzed: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab mo rtogs nas mgu ste /
translated: Having realized the profound meaning of the perfection of wisdom, they were delighted.

original: bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas so so'i gnas su @122b dong ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas so so'i gnas su @122b dong ba bstan pa'o //
translated: Having served the Bhagavan, they went to their own abodes.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad cing mos pa phun sum tshogs pa'i mi rnams /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la lhag par dad cing gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gang nas tshe 'phos te /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad cing mos pa phun sum tshogs pa'i mi rnams / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la lhag par dad cing gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gang nas tshe 'phos te /
translated: Then the venerable Subhuti said to the Bhagavan and so on explains how those people who have perfect faith and devotion in this profound perfection of wisdom

original: mi med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes par gyur pa zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ste /
analyzed: mi med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes par gyur pa zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ste /
translated: generate special faith and respect for this profound perfection of wisdom, and so they ask from where they have transmigrated and been reborn in this world system devoid of buddhas,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and the Bhagavan explains.🔽The Bhagavan said and so on explains the answer.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni mi'i nang nas tshe 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni mi'i nang nas tshe 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: Subhūti, that person who is a bodhisattva vehicle practitioner has passed away as a human and has been reborn as a human.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas dad pa dang mos pa skyes te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas dad pa dang mos pa skyes te /
translated: Having heard this profound perfection of wisdom, faith and interest have arisen.

original: sems ma zhum zhing ma rmongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig spyod lam bzhi char du yid la byed cing yi dam nyams par mi byed la /
analyzed: sems ma zhum zhing ma rmongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig spyod lam bzhi char du yid la byed cing yi dam nyams par mi byed la /
translated: Their mind is not discouraged or confused, and they attend to only the perfection of wisdom in all four modes of conduct, and do not let their vows deteriorate.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don mthar ma phyin gyi bar du de ston pa'i mkhan po yang mi gtong ba de ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don mthar ma phyin gyi bar du de ston pa'i mkhan po yang mi gtong ba de ni /
translated: Until they have completed the meaning of the perfection of wisdom, they do not let go of the master who teaches it.

original: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas mi'i nang nas tshe 'phos te /
analyzed: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas mi'i nang nas tshe 'phos te /
translated: They have passed away as a human in this very Sahā world system,🔽and have been reborn as a human in this very Jambudvīpa.

original: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yang mi'i nang du skyes pa yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yang mi'i nang du skyes pa yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas zhes bya ba nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yang thos ma thag tu
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas zhes bya ba nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yang thos ma thag tu
translated: one should see that one who has faith and interest in this profound perfection of wisdom as soon as it is heard.

original: mos par 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos nas dad cing mos pas spyod pa'i mi de mi'i nang nas tshe 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
analyzed: mos par 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos nas dad cing mos pas spyod pa'i mi de mi'i nang nas tshe 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
translated: This shows the reason why that person who has faith and interest in the perfection of wisdom after hearing it, having passed away from among humans, is born among humans.

original: de sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la goms par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis da yang mi'i nang du skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing dad
analyzed: de sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la goms par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis da yang mi'i nang du skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing dad
translated: It is because of that very root of virtue of having cultivated this profound perfection of wisdom before that one is now born among humans and has faith and interest in this profound perfection of wisdom as soon as it is heard.

original: par gyur te zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: par gyur te zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: This is what is shown.

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la thos ma thag tu mos shing @123a * //
translated: He said, “Blessed One, the bodhisattva great beings who, as soon as they hear this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: have faith in it, and so on up to🔽they are born here by means of those very roots of virtue and those very mental attentions.”

original: de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang / yid la bya ba de nyid kyis 'dir skyes pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dad cing spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag
analyzed: de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang / yid la bya ba de nyid kyis 'dir skyes pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dad cing spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag
translated: This passage teaches that some bodhisattvas who have faith in and practice this perfection of wisdom were previously in other world systems

original: la bsnyen bkur byas te /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byas pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes te /
analyzed: la bsnyen bkur byas te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byas pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes te /
translated: attendants of other blessed buddhas

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad cing spyod pa dag kyang yod do zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: and through becoming familiar with the perfection of wisdom were born in this world system and have faith in and practice this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa las zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa las zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, some bodhisattva great beings, having been reborn among the Tuṣita gods, having heard this deep perfection of wisdom from the bodhisattva Maitreya,🔽should be known as having been reborn here through that wholesome root.

original: de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris na byams pa byang chub sems dpa'
analyzed: de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris na byams pa byang chub sems dpa'
translated: This passage teaches that some bodhisattvas practicing this deep perfection of wisdom, having heard this perfection of wisdom from the bodhisattva Maitreya in the Tuṣita god realm,

original: la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas 'dir mi'i nang du skyes te /
analyzed: la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas 'dir mi'i nang du skyes te /
translated: are reborn here among humans through the wholesome root of listening to this perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dad cing spyod par gyur pa dag kyang yod do zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dad cing spyod par gyur pa dag kyang yod do zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: And they have faith in and practice this perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, those persons who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, who have heard this profound perfection of wisdom in the past, but have not asked questions about it and have not investigated it, will not understand it.

original: mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /🔽nem nur du 'gyur /🔽rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe / nem nur du 'gyur / rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, those persons who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, who have heard this profound perfection of wisdom in the past but have not asked questions about it and have not investigated it, when this profound perfection of wisdom is being taught,🔽will be doubtful,🔽will be confused,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur /
translated: will be disheartened,

analyzed: sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas / rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
translated: and their minds will turn away from it.

original: phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe /🔽nem nur du 'gyur /
analyzed: phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe / nem nur du 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, those persons who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, who have heard this unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in the past but have not asked questions about it and have not investigated it, when this perfection of wisdom is being taught,🔽will be doubtful,🔽will be disheartened,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur /
translated: and their minds will turn away from it.

original: sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni tshe rabs snga ma la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di cung zad cig thos su zin kyang /
analyzed: sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni tshe rabs snga ma la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di cung zad cig thos su zin kyang /
translated: The passage up to “the aspect of the mind changes” teaches that even though in previous lives one may have heard this perfection of wisdom a little,

analyzed: dri zhing brtags pas goms @123b par ma byas pa ni tshe 'di la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na the tshom skye zhing dad par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ste /
translated: if one has not become familiar with it through questioning and investigation, then in this life also, when one hears this profound perfection of wisdom, one will give rise to doubt and will not have faith.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la thug gi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la thug gi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Just as it is for the perfection of wisdom, so it is for the knowledge of path aspects and so on up to unsurpassed perfect complete awakening.
